name: Clown2Beat
description: You are selected to be part of a circus, open the doors and beat the Clowns, solving the challenges before the clock ends.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: We have found SSDs to be the best user experience
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit or later Processor: Intel Core i7 4930K processor or faster Graphics: Nvidia GTX 770 video card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: We have found SSDs to be the best user experience

reviews.review_text: Clown2Beat, even indie devs need to cash in on clown memes before its too late. That being said, its a great game if you like beating clowns with a hammer.
